statements: SELECT * FROM files;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_id, file_name FROM files ORDER BY file_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM files WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT file_id, file_size FROM files WHERE file_size < 5000 ORDER BY file_id DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM files WHERE file_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT file_name, upload_date FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_name LIKE '%report%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_files, SUM(file_size) AS total_size FROM files;
SELECT file_name, upload_date FROM files WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM files;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM files WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM files ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size, description FROM files JOIN file_metadata ON files.file_id = file_metadata.file_id;
SELECT file_id, file_name FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000000;
SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_name='example.txt';
SELECT file_id, file_name FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000000 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT files.file_name, file_metadata.description FROM files INNER JOIN file_metadata ON files.file_id = file_metadata.file_id WHERE file_metadata.tags @> '["important"]';
SELECT files.file_id, files.file_name, file_metadata.tags FROM files LEFT JOIN file_metadata ON files.file_id = file_metadata.file_id WHERE files.upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(file_size) AS largest_file_size FROM files;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM file_metadata;
SELECT * FROM file_tags;
SELECT tag_name FROM file_tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size, upload_date FROM file_metadata WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, tag_name FROM file_metadata JOIN file_relations ON file_metadata.file_id = file_relations.file_id JOIN file_tags ON file_relations.tag_id = file_tags.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM file_metadata;
SELECT file_name, file_size, upload_date FROM file_metadata WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, tag_name FROM file_metadata INNER JOIN file_relations ON file_metadata.file_id = file_relations.file_id INNER JOIN file_tags ON file_relations.tag_id = file_tags.tag_id;
SELECT file_name, COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM file_metadata INNER JOIN file_relations ON file_metadata.file_id = file_relations.file_id GROUP BY file_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY tag_count DESC;
SELECT MAX(file_size) AS max_size, MIN(file_size) AS min_size FROM file_metadata;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM FileMetadata;
SELECT * FROM FileMetadata WHERE upload_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT tag_name FROM FileTags WHERE file_id = 123;
SELECT file_id, user_id, permission_type FROM FilePermissions WHERE permission_type = 'read';
SELECT * FROM FileVersions ORDER BY version_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM FileMetadata;
SELECT file_name, file_size, upload_date FROM FileMetadata WHERE file_id = 1;
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_size, upload_date FROM FileMetadata ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT f.file_id, f.file_name, f.upload_date, t.tag_name FROM FileMetadata f JOIN FileTags t ON f.file_id = t.file_id;
SELECT v.version_id, v.version_number, v.version_description, f.file_name FROM FileVersions v JOIN FileMetadata f ON v.file_id = f.file_id WHERE v.version_number > 3;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM FilesMetadata;
SELECT * FROM FilesMetadata ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size, upload_date FROM FilesMetadata WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT tag_name FROM FileTags WHERE file_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT log_description, log_date FROM FileLogs ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT file_id, file_name FROM FilesMetadata WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM FileTags WHERE tag_name LIKE '%important%';
SELECT file_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS num_comments FROM FileComments GROUP BY file_id HAVING num_comments > 5;
SELECT file_id, permission_type FROM FilesMetadata INNER JOIN FilePermissions ON FilesMetadata.file_id = FilePermissions.permission_id;
SELECT FilesMetadata.file_name, FileLogs.log_description FROM FilesMetadata LEFT JOIN FileLogs ON FilesMetadata.file_id = FileLogs.file_id ORDER BY FileLogs.log_date DESC LIMIT 3;
